attributes.action: Publish plans for withdrawal from the United Nations.
attributes.additional_details:
And as the United Nations was used to re-enforce the EU's undemocratic demands for open borders, this organisation is to be first. Plans are to be made to justify each organisations existence TO THE PEOPLE OF THIS COUNTRY and PUBLISH this or organise our withdrawal from these organisations.

No exceptions are to be made. The United Nations, World Bank and World Health Organisation have all shown they are unfit to have us as members. We are to withdraw. MAKE IT SO!
attributes.background: We, the people who give you employment, demand plans be made to investigate the true profit of belonging to "Global Sovereignty Vampire" organisations. Organisations formed to appear to be for the benefit of the people but in reality money laundering clubs to rob the poor in favour of the rich.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
 
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the UK Government or Parliament to withdraw from the United Nations, World Bank and World Health Organisation, is that's what you'd like to happen.
